ConditionBlock._: ( static Self ident "Pressed" ) call "Geninstate" ( static Self ident "Disabled" ) call "Geninstate" not and

ExprLine.OrigStr: GenInState(Self, Pressed) and not GenInState(Self, Disabled)

ConditionBlock._: ( str "Characterselection_List" ) call "Gen" objpath ".Var[newcharacter].Int" not ( ( str "Characterselection_List" ) call "Gen" objpath ".Var[selectedcontainerid].Int" ) call "Characterpathcanuseid" not and

ExpressionBlock._: ( static Self ident "Disabled" ( ) call "Logingetplayertype" ( ( str "Characterselection_List" ) call "Gen" objpath ".Var[mouseoverindex].Int" int 1 neg equals ( str "Characterselection_List" ) call "Gen" objpath ".Var[selectedplayertype].Int" ( str "Characterselection_List" ) call "Gen" objpath ".Var[mouseoverplayertype].Int" ) call "Chooseint" equals not ( str "Characterselection_List" ) call "Gen" objpath ".Var[newcharacter].Int" not and ( ( str "Characterselection_List" ) call "Gen" objpath ".Var[mouseoverindex].Int" int 1 neg equals ( str "Characterselection_List" ) call "Gen" objpath ".Var[selectedplayertype].Int" ( str "Characterselection_List" ) call "Gen" objpath ".Var[mouseoverplayertype].Int" ) call "Chooseint" ident "Playertypesuperpremium" less and ) call "Gensetstate"

ExprLine.OrigStr:
GenSetState(Self, Disabled, not LoginGetPlayerType() = ChooseInt( Gen("CharacterSelection_List").Var[MouseoverIndex].int = -1, Gen("CharacterSelection_List").Var[SelectedPlayerType].Int, Gen("CharacterSelection_List").Var[MouseOverPlayerType].Int) and not Gen("CharacterSelection_List").Var[NewCharacter].Int and ChooseInt( Gen("CharacterSelection_List").Var[MouseoverIndex].int = -1, Gen("CharacterSelection_List").Var[SelectedPlayerType].Int, Gen("CharacterSelection_List").Var[MouseOverPlayerType].Int) < PlayerTypeSuperPremium
);
